extension.summary: Current weather conditions and colorful forecasts.
extension.description: (Originally by Nuka1195)[CR][CR]This is the advanced weather source.[CR]It provides not only current weather conditions but also extended forecasts and information including forecast videos and weather alerts.[CR]Default weather provider is Weather.com, and you can use alternative providers such as Accuweather.com or NOAA. [CR][CR]For any information, http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?t=95329
